#Goodworkconnected "We want to live in a society in which there is no master and no servant. But mature citizens."
#goodworkconnected "We must improve the world that we have inherited and not pass it down to our children!"
#goodworkconnected "We have to get things back on track a few years ago."
#gutarbeitverbindet "We reject the demarcation between private and work life."
#gutarbeitverbindet "Competitiveness in the 21st century does not depend on wage dumping, but on employee qualification!"
#Goodworkconnected "Education must be free of charge, from daycare to university!"
#Goodwork connected "We will expand the special protection against dismissal for the initiators of works council elections."
#goodworkconnected "If you want to organize a works council, you shouldn't be kicked out!"
#goodworkconnected: ‚ÄúCo-determination in the company is a model for the future. Unfortunately not everyone understood that yet! "
#goodworkconnected "We want a cultural change in working time policy u. enable people to work more independently! "
#goodworkconnected "It's about respect for people's lifetime achievement!"
#goodworkconnected ‚ÄúPeople who have worked hard can fall into basic security in a short time. We have to change that!"
#gutarbeitverbindet "We have to work on the fixed-term contracts of many jobs. The CDU and CSU are walling here."
#goodworkconnected "We also made mistakes! Making mistakes is not an honor. It is important to recognize them and correct them. "
#goodworkconnected: "The neoliberal mainstream has declared all the advantages of our social market economy to be obstacles to growth."
#goodworkconnected ‚ÄúInequality is increasing. Feels AND actually. "
#Workingconnected ‚ÄúIt's not all bad. But not all is well either. And we have to talk about it if it is going to get better. "
"Unions and Social democracy know: progress u. Prosperity does not fall from the sky. You will be won. Together!"
#goodworkconnected "Only together with the unions can we make our country better and fairer."
